price: [موسی] گفت: «من آن [کار] را زمانی انجام دادم که از بی‌خبران بودم [نمى‌دانستم مشتى سبب قتل می‌گردد].
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
